package.name: SwitchShades
package.shortDescription: Multitasking background based on app icon.

descriptionlist.description:
The tweak brings a soft background tint based on icon color to multitasking. Smooth transitions are also included :)
Settings will allow you to: ∙ Select the type of shade based on the icon or application preview ∙ Use an alternate color (useful for dark themes) ∙ Set the transparency level of the shade Also, the tweak has a good optimization. You won't even notice a performance change when multitasking swipes quickly.
